sense.def:
Kadar je nekaj storjeno
by a person or thing
, tisto stori neka oseba ali stvar.

seg.quote: He was brought up by an aunt.
I was startled by his anger.
...the use of pocket calculators by schoolchildren.

sense.def:
Kadar nekaj dosežemo
by doing another thing
, to pomeni, da nam neko dejanje omogoči, da dosežemo prvo omenjeno stvar.

seg.quote: By bribing a nurse I was able to see some files.
They were making a living by selling souvenirs to the tourists.

sense.def:
Z besedo
by
povemo, kako je nekaj narejeno.

seg.quote: The money will be paid by cheque.
We heard from them by phone.
I always go by bus.

sense.def:
Kadar rečemo, da je kakšna knjiga, skladba ali slika
by someone
, hočemo povedati, da jo je tisti človek napisal ali ustvaril.

seg.quote: ...three books by a great Australian writer.

sense.def:
Kar je
by something else
, stoji zraven in blizu tistega.

seg.quote: I sat by her bed.

sense.def:
Kadar nekaj
passes by someone
, gre mimo nekoga, ne da bi se ustavilo.

seg.quote: People rushed by us.
They watched the cars whizzing by.

sense.def:
Kadar se nekaj zgodi
by a particular time
, se zgodi takrat ali prej.

seg.quote: He can be out by seven.
By 1940 the number had grown to 185 millions.

sense.def:
Kadar je človek
by himself
, je sam. Če nekaj stori
by himself
, tisto stori, ne da bi mu kdo pomagal.

seg.quote: He was standing by himself in a corner of the room.
She did not think she could manage by herself.

sense.def:
Stvari, ki so izdelane ali jih prodajajo
by the million
ali
by the dozen
, so narejene ali jih prodajajo v takih količinah.

seg.quote: Books can be mailed by the dozen.

sense.def:
Besedo
by
uporabljamo v izrazih, kot je
day by day
, kadar hočemo povedati, da se nekaj dogaja zaporedoma.

cit.quote: za (dan za dnem, drug za drugim)

seg.quote: The university gets bigger year by year.
The children had one by one fallen asleep.

sense.def:
Kadar nekaj narašča ali se zmanjšuje
by a particular amount
, izgubi ali pridobi tolikšno količino nečesa.

seg.quote: Its grant is to be cut by more than 40 per cent.

sense.def:
Če človek nekoga ali nekaj drži
by a particular part of them
, ga drži za določeni del telesa.

seg.quote: My mother took me firmly by the hand.
